titles.title: A bill to amend the Military Selective Service Act to provide additional selective service registration procedures.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

bill.summary: 3/29/1988--Introduced. Amends the Military Selective Service Act to provide that any person required to register for selective service under such Act who applies for any form of right, privilege, or benefit under Federal law for which registration with selective service is required shall be considered, by reason of such application, to have so registered.
